Name: Verify Successful Product Viewing and Checkout Process
Description: Navigate to the home page and view recommended products. Add a product to the basket and proceed to view the account. Access the shop and view a specific product. Verify the product page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home login > navigate to Page home
step 3: At Page home, click on hyperlink recommended > navigate to Page recommended
step 4: At Page recommended, click on img object > navigate to Page product
step 5: At Page product, click on button add to basket
step 6: At Page product, click on hyperlink home > navigate to Page home
step 7: At Page home, click on hyperlink see all
step 8: At Page home, click on hyperlink see all > navigate to Page recommended
step 9: At Page recommended, click on h5 object
step 10: At Page recommended, click on h5 object
step 11: At Page recommended, click on hyperlink view account
step 12: At Page recommended, click on hyperlink view account > navigate to Page account
step 13: At Page account, click on li object
step 14: At Page account, click on li object
step 15: At Page account, click on li object
step 16: At Page account, click on li object
step 17: At Page account, click on hyperlink shop
step 18: At Page account, click on hyperlink shop > navigate to Page shop
step 19: At Page shop, click on h5 object > navigate to Page product
step 20: Add visual checkpoint at Page product

Name: Verify Successful Checkout Process with Full Name Email and Address Input
Description: Navigate to the home page and sign in. Add a plant to the basket and proceed to checkout. Enter full name, email, and address information. Verify the checkout page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home, click on hyperlink sign in > navigate to Page signin
step 3: At Page signin, input on input email
step 4: At Page signin, input on input password
step 5: At Page signin, click on button sign in > navigate to Page home
step 6: At Page home, click on hyperlink plant now > navigate to Page shop
step 7: At Page shop, click on div object > navigate to Page product
step 8: At Page product, click on button add to basket
step 9: At Page product, click on svg object
step 10: At Page product, click on button check out > navigate to Page checkout
step 11: At Page checkout, click on button next step
step 12: At Page checkout, input on input fullname
step 13: At Page checkout, input on input email
step 14: At Page checkout, input on input address
step 15: At Page checkout, input on input object
step 16: At Page checkout, click on input object
step 17: At Page checkout, click on button next step
step 18: Add visual checkpoint at Page checkout

Name: Verify Successful Product Viewing from Shop Page
Description: Navigate to the home page and view the shop. View a specific product and verify the product page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home login > navigate to Page home
step 3: At Page home, click on hyperlink shop > navigate to Page producs
step 4: At Page producs, click on button go back > navigate to Page shop
step 5: At Page shop, click on div object
step 6: At Page shop, click on div object > navigate to Page product
step 7: Add visual checkpoint at Page product

Name: Verify Successful Sign in to Checkout Process
Description: Navigate to the home page and view the shop. Add a product to the basket and proceed to checkout. Sign in to checkout and verify the sign-in page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home, click on hyperlink plant now > navigate to Page shop
step 3: At Page shop, click on div object > navigate to Page product
step 4: At Page product, click on button add to basket
step 5: At Page product, click on svg object
step 6: At Page product, click on button check out
step 7: At Page product, click on button sign in to checkout > navigate to Page signin
step 8: Add visual checkpoint at Page signin

Name: Verify Successful Signup Process from Shop Page
Description: Navigate to the home page and view the shop. View a specific product and proceed to sign up. Verify the signup page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home, click on hyperlink shop > navigate to Page producs
step 3: At Page producs, click on button go back > navigate to Page shop
step 4: At Page shop, click on div object
step 5: At Page shop, click on div object > navigate to Page product
step 6: At Page product, click on hyperlink sign up > navigate to Page signup
step 7: Add visual checkpoint at Page signup
